description: '''Jules Jean Vanobbergen''' (6 July 1936 – 1 December 2021) was a Belgian singer-songwriter better known as '''Grand Jojo''' in French and '''Lange Jojo''' in Dutch. Grand Jojo is best known as the co-writer of "[[Anderlecht]] Champions (Allez, Allez, Allez)", which later became "[[Olé, Olé, Olé]]", and "Chef, un p'tit verre, on a soif" (Barman, a little drink, we are thirsty).
